import argparse
import os
import platform
import sys
from pathlib import Path

import torch

FILE = Path(__file__).resolve()
ROOT = FILE.parents[0]  # YOLOv5 root directory
if str(ROOT) not in sys.path:
    sys.path.append(str(ROOT))  # add ROOT to PATH
ROOT = Path(os.path.relpath(ROOT, Path.cwd()))  # relative

from models.common import DetectMultiBackend
from utils.dataloaders import IMG_FORMATS, VID_FORMATS, LoadImages, LoadScreenshots, LoadStreams
from utils.general import (LOGGER, Profile, check_file, check_img_size, check_imshow, check_requirements, colorstr, cv2,
                           increment_path, non_max_suppression, print_args, scale_boxes, strip_optimizer, xyxy2xywh)
from utils.plots import Annotator, colors, save_one_box
from utils.torch_utils import select_device, smart_inference_mode
@smart_inference_mode()
def run(
        weights=ROOT / 'yolov5s.pt',  # model path or triton URL
        source=ROOT / 'data/images',  # file/dir/URL/glob/screen/0(webcam)
        data=ROOT / 'data/coco128.yaml',  # dataset.yaml path
        imgsz=(640, 640),  # inference size (height, width)
        conf_thres=0.25,  # confidence threshold
        iou_thres=0.45,  # NMS IOU threshold
        max_det=1000,  # maximum detections per image
        device='',  # cuda device, i.e. 0 or 0,1,2,3 or cpu
        view_img=False,  # show results
        save_txt=False,  # save results to *.txt
        save_conf=False,  # save confidences in --save-txt labels
        save_crop=False,  # save cropped prediction boxes
        nosave=False,  # do not save images/videos
        classes=None,  # filter by class: --class 0, or --class 0 2 3
        agnostic_nms=False,  # class-agnostic NMS
        augment=False,  # augmented inference
        visualize=False,  # visualize features
        update=False,  # update all models
        project=ROOT / 'runs/detect',  # save results to project/name
        name='exp',  # save results to project/name
        exist_ok=False,  # existing project/name ok, do not increment
        line_thickness=3,  # bounding box thickness (pixels)
        hide_labels=False,  # hide labels
        hide_conf=False,  # hide confidences
        half=False,  # use FP16 half-precision inference
        dnn=False,  # use OpenCV DNN for ONNX inference
        vid_stride=1,  # video frame-rate stride
):
    source = str(source)
    save_img = not nosave and not source.endswith('.txt')  # save inference images
    is_file = Path(source).suffix[1:] in (IMG_FORMATS + VID_FORMATS)
    is_url = source.lower().startswith(('rtsp://', 'rtmp://', 'http://', 'https://'))
    webcam = source.isnumeric() or source.endswith('.streams') or (is_url and not is_file)
    screenshot = source.lower().startswith('screen')
    if is_url and is_file:
        source = check_file(source)  # download
    # Directories
    save_dir = increment_path(Path(project) / name, exist_ok=exist_ok)  # increment run
    (save_dir / 'labels' if save_txt else save_dir).mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)  # make dir
    # Load model
    device = select_device(device)
    model = DetectMultiBackend(weights, device=device, dnn=dnn, data=data, fp16=half)
    stride, names, pt = model.stride, model.names, model.pt
    imgsz = check_img_size(imgsz, s=stride)  # check image size
    # Dataloader
    bs = 1  # batch_size
    if webcam:
        view_img = check_imshow(warn=True)
        dataset = LoadStreams(source, img_size=imgsz, stride=stride, auto=pt, vid_stride=vid_stride)
        bs = len(dataset)
    elif screenshot:
        dataset = LoadScreenshots(source, img_size=imgsz, stride=stride, auto=pt)
    else:
        dataset = LoadImages(source, img_size=imgsz, stride=stride, auto=pt, vid_stride=vid_stride)
    vid_path, vid_writer = [None] * bs, [None] * bs
    # Run inference
    model.warmup(imgsz=(1 if pt or model.triton else bs, 3, *imgsz))  # warmup
    seen, windows, dt = 0, [], (Profile(), Profile(), Profile())
    for path, im, im0s, vid_cap, s in dataset:
        with dt[0]:

im = torch.from_numpy(im).to(device)  # inference tensor
        im = im.half() if half else im.float()  # half precision
        im /= 255.0  # 0-255 to 0.0-1.0
        s, t = s.numpy(), im.shape  # index, shape

        # Inference
        with dt[1]:
            if pt:
                # Fast inference
                pred = model(im, augment=augment)[0]
            else:
                # PyTorch Detections
                pred = model(im, augment=augment, visualize=visualize)[0]

        # Non-maximum suppression
        with dt[2]:
            pred = non_max_suppression(
                pred, conf_thres, iou_thres, classes, agnostic_nms, max_det=max_det, multi_label=True
            )

        # Process detections
        for i, det in enumerate(pred):  # detections per image
            seen += 1
            p, s = path[i], im0s[:, :, :, i].shape

            # Save results (image with detections)
            if save_img or view_img:
                annotator = Annotator(im0s[:, :, :, i], name=names if hide_conf else None, line_width=line_thickness)
                color = None
                for *xyxy, conf, cls in det:
                    # Add bbox to image
                    c = int(cls)
                    color = annotator.box_label(xyxy, conf, names[c], color=color, hide_labels=hide_labels)
                    # Plot landmarks
                    if visualize:
                        cls_data = classes, names
                        annotator.landmark(xyxy, visualize, color, cls_data)

                # Stream results
                if view_img:
                    cv2.imshow(str(s), im0s[:, :, :, i])
                    delay = 1  # minimum time per-frame
                    k = cv2.waitKey(delay) & 0xFF  # 0xFF == ord(255)
                    if k == ord("q"):  # q: quit
                        raise StopIteration
                    elif k == ord("s"):  # s: save
                        save_one_box(xyxy, im0s, file=save_dir / "temp.jpg", gain=s)
                        print("Image saved to `%s`" % save_dir)
                    if screens:  # quit after 1 screen
                        break

                # Save image
                if save_img:
                    cv2.imwrite(str(save_dir / p.name), annotator.result())

            # Save *.txt labels
            if save_txt:
                save_one_box(xyxy, None, file=save_dir / "labels" / f"{p.stem}.txt", write=save_conf)

            # Logging
            if i == 0 and t:
                LOGGER.info(
                    f"{path}  ({s[0]:g}x{s[1]:g}) done in {dt[2].delta * 1e3:.1f}ms: {colors(c)}{p.stem}{colorstr()}"
                )

    LOGGER.info(

import cv2
from filterpy.kalman import KalmanFilter
import numpy as np

kf = KalmanFilter(dim_x=4, dim_z=2)
kf.x = np.array([0, 0, 0, 0]) # initial state estimate
kf.P = np.eye(4) * 1000 # initial error covariance matrix
kf.F = np.array([[1, 0, 1, 0],
                 [0, 1, 0, 1],
                 [0, 0, 1, 0],
                 [0, 0, 0, 1]]) # state transition matrix
kf.H = np.array([[1, 0, 0, 0],
                 [0, 1, 0, 0]]) # measurement matrix
kf.R = np.diag([0.1, 0.1]) # measurement noise covariance matrix
kf.Q=  np.diag([0.1, 0.1, 0.1, 0.1])

cap = cv2.VideoCapture("1_1.mp4")
frame_num = 0

# optical flow parameters
lk_params = dict(winSize=(15,15),
                 maxLevel=4,
                 criteria=(cv2.TERM_CRITERIA_EPS | cv2.TERM_CRITERIA_COUNT, 10, 0.03),
                 flags=0)

prev_gray = None
prev_pts = None
motion_regions = []
ball_position = None
ball_speed = None

while True:
    ret, frame = cap.read()
    if ret is False:
        break
        
    frame_num += 1
    
    # convert the frame to grayscale for optical flow calculation
    gray = cv2.cvtColor(frame, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
    
    # apply optical flow to estimate the motion between the frames
    if prev_gray is not None and prev_pts is not None:
        pts, status, _ = cv2.calcOpticalFlowPyrLK(prev_gray, gray, prev_pts, None, **lk_params)
        
        # extract the motion regions based on the optical flow magnitude
        motion_regions = []
        for p, s in zip(pts, status):
            if s == 1:
                x, y = p.ravel()
                motion_regions.append((int(x), int(y)))
        motion_regions = np.array(motion_regions)
        
        if len(motion_regions) > 0:
            # calculate the centroid of the motion regions to determine the position of the ball
            ball_position = np.mean(motion_regions, axis=0).astype(np.float32)
            
            if ball_speed is not None:
                # predict where the ball will be in the next frame based on its position and velocity
                ball_position += dt * ball_speed
            
            # update the Kalman filter with the ball position measurement
            kf.predict()
            kf.update(ball_position)
            
            # get the filtered ball position as the predicted next position
            next_position = kf.x[:2]
            
            # update the ball speed based on the Kalman filter output
            ball_speed = next_position - ball_position
            
            # check if the ball is outside of the frame or changes direction, indicating a bounce
            if next_position[0] < 0 or next_position[0] > frame.shape[1] or next_position[1] < 0 or next_position[1] > frame.shape[0] or np.linalg.norm(ball_speed) < 1e-3:
                print("Bounce detected at frame ", frame_num)
                
                # visualize the bounce detection as a red circle around the ball position
                cv2.circle(frame, (int(ball_position[0]), int(ball_position[1])), 10, (0, 0, 255), 4)
            
            # visualize the ball position and predicted next position as blue and green circles, respectively
            cv2.circle(frame, (int(ball_position[0]), int(ball_position[1])), 5, (255, 0, 0), 2)
            cv2.circle(frame, (int(next_position[0]), int(next_position[1])), 5, (0, 255, 0), 2)
    
    # update the previous frame and feature points for the next iteration
    prev_gray = gray
    prev_pts = cv2.goodFeaturesToTrack(gray, maxCorners=200, qualityLevel=0.01, minDistance=10, blockSize=3)
            
    cv2.putText(frame, f'Frame: {frame_num}', (10, 50), cv2.FONT_HERSHEY_SIMPLEX, 1, (0, 255, 0), 2)
    cv2.imshow('raw', frame)
    
    if cv2.waitKey(1) & 0xFF == ord('q'):
        break

cap.release()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

conversation.content: How do I make a 15 second turntable playblast at 24fps in Autodesk Maya?

To make a 15-second turntable playblast at 24fps in Autodesk Maya, follow these steps:

1. Create a camera and position it where you want it in the scene.
2. Select the camera and go to the Attribute Editor. Under the Camera Shape tab, change the Camera Type to "Orthographic".
3. Go to the Animation menu and select Create Turntable. Set the number of frames to 360 (15 seconds at 24fps).
4. In the Create Turntable options, select your camera and adjust the rotation axis to fit your object's orientation.
5. Click Create Turntable and wait for it to finish.
6. Go to the Time Slider and set the playback range to the length of the turntable animation (360 frames).
7. Go to the Viewport and adjust the camera framing if necessary.
8. Go to the Render Settings and set the resolution and file format as desired.
9. Go to the Display menu and select Playblast. In the Playblast options, set the format to Quicktime, the compression to H.264, and the frame rate to 24fps.
10. Click on the Playblast button and wait for it to finish.

这段代码实现了使用AForge.NET库添加视频转场特效的功能。具体实现分为以下几个步骤：

1.读取原始视频文件。

2.初始化视频写入器，设置保存视频的文件名、宽度、高度、帧率、编码方式等参数。

3.获取原始视频的第一帧，并把它拷贝到一个缓冲区中。

4.循环遍历每一帧视频，根据所选择的转场特效类型和特效持续时间，对每一帧进行处理，并将处理后的帧写入输出视频文件中。

5.释放资源，关闭读写器等。

具体的特效处理代码实现了两种基本转场特效：渐变效果和融合效果。渐变效果是指将前一帧和当前帧进行淡入淡出处理，实现视频帧之间的平滑转换。融合效果是指将前一帧和当前帧进行混合，实现视频帧之间的渐变效果。在处理过程中，需要计算每一帧的透明度或融合系数，用于控制特效的效果，并根据计算出的透明度或融合系数，对前一帧和当前帧的像素进行融合或淡入淡出处理，生成新的帧图像。最终将处理后的帧写入输出视频文件中。
可是运行声音没有了，如何保留原来的声音 ，不另外添加别的库

如果希望在处理视频的同时保留原始视频的声音，需要在代码中添加相应的处理逻辑。具体实现步骤如下：

1.读取原始视频文件和对应的音频文件。

2.初始化视频写入器和音频写入器，设置保存视频和音频文件的文件名、宽度、高度、帧率、编码方式等参数。

3.获取原始视频的第一帧，并把它拷贝到一个缓冲区中。

4.循环遍历每一帧视频，根据所选择的转场特效类型和特效持续时间，对每一帧进行处理，并将处理后的帧写入输出视频文件中。

5.同时也要将原始音频文件中的音频数据写入输出音频文件中。

6.释放资源，关闭读写器等。

在实现以上步骤时，需要注意以下几点：

1.由于视频和音频的数据是分别存储的，需要分别读取和处理视频和音频数据，并将它们写入到对应的输出文件中。

2.在将视频和音频数据写入到输出文件中时，需要按照对应的时间顺序进行写入，确保视频和音频的同步。

3.在处理过程中，需要根据视频和音频的时间戳对帧数据和音频数据进行匹配，确保它们的时间戳一致。

在不添加其他库的情况下，可以使用FFmpeg库来处理视频和音频数据，并实现它们的同步。可以参考以下链接了解如何使用FFmpeg：https://ffmpeg.org/documentation.html

如果 C# 代码报错显示“VideoFileWriter”未包含“VideoCodec”的定义，那很可能是因为你使用的是旧版的 AForge.NET 库。在旧版的 AForge.NET 中，`VideoFileWriter` 没有 `VideoCodec` 属性。

python 有什么库可以实现对视频进行剪辑，加上特效，对每一帧进行处理的库

Python中常用来处理视频的库有OpenCV和MoviePy。

OpenCV是一个强大的计算机视觉库，有着广泛的应用，可以用Python进行调用。它可以对视频进行读取、写入；对每一帧进行处理，比如说添加特效，剪辑等等。使用OpenCV，您可以对视频进行几乎所有的图像和视频处理操作。

MoviePy是一个基于FFmpeg的Python库，也可以用于对视频进行剪辑、添加特效，对每一帧进行处理。它提供了较为简单的进口机制，并支持GIF、WebM、MP4等多种格式。可以使用MoviePy在Python中轻松创建新的视频，以及对现有视频进行剪辑、剪切和转换等操作。

总的来说，要根据具体的需求来选择使用合适的库。如果需要进行更复杂的视频处理，可以使用OpenCV；如果需要在Python中轻松创建和编辑新视频，并且只需要添加简单的特效，则可以使用MoviePy。
OpenCV和FFMPEG 哪一个更强大

OpenCV和FFmpeg都是非常强大的库，但它们的应用场景有所不同。

OpenCV是一个计算机视觉库，它提供了图像和视频处理的功能，包括读取、写入、缩放、裁剪、调整对比度和饱和度、特效处理等等。OpenCV不仅仅可以处理图像和视频，还可以进行人脸识别、目标跟踪、运动分析等计算机视觉和深度学习任务。

相比之下，FFmpeg是一个多媒体框架，主要用于解决音频和视频处理方面的问题。它可以处理包括视频编码、解码、过滤、转换、分解、合并、流媒体传输等在内的许多常用的多媒体任务。

因此，如果您需要进行计算机视觉任务，比如图像和视频处理、物体识别、人脸检测，那么OpenCV会更适合。而如果你需要处理音频和视频，FFmpeg则会是更好的选择。但实际上，OpenCV也可以使用FFmpeg作为后台来进行一些视频处理任务，两个库可以根据需要相互结合使用。

opencv 中的 meanshift  是什么

在计算机视觉领域，Meanshift是一种基于密度的追踪算法。它主要用于跟踪视频中的目标对象，并提供其位置信息。Meanshift可以应用于许多计算机视觉应用程序中，例如实时跟踪、人机交互等。

Meanshift算法的主要思想是在给定的数据分布中寻找最高的密度区域。该算法通常由以下几个步骤组成：

1. 在图像或视频帧中选择一个小的初始窗口或区域，该窗口或区域包含目标对象。

2. 计算该窗口或区域内所有像素的颜色直方图。

3. 将初始窗口或区域移动到在图像或视频中找到的与先前窗口或区域颜色直方图最相似的位置，即寻找最大密度点。

4. 重复步骤3，直到算法收敛。

Meanshift算法通常与Camshift (Continuously Adaptive Meanshift)一起使用，从而提供更准确的目标跟踪。

conversation.content: как в Qt6 получить метаданные фотографии?

В Qt6 для получения метаданных изображений, таких как EXIF или XMP, вы можете использовать класс `QExifImageHeader` из модуля `QtMultimedia`. Вот пример того, как можно использовать этот класс для извлечения метаданных фотографии:

1. Установите модуль QtMultimedia, если он еще не установлен (требуется только для Qt 6+):
```
pip install PyQt6-Multimedia
```

2. Создайте пример файла python для чтения метаданных:

```python
from PyQt6.QtMultimedia import QExifImageHeader
from PyQt6.QtCore import QFile, QSizeF, Qt

def print_exif_data(exif_header):
    for t in exif_header.availableTags():
        data = exif_header.value(t)
        
        tag_map = {
            QExifImageHeader.ImageTag.Artist: "Artist",
            QExifImageHeader.ImageTag.ImageDescription: "Image Description",
            QExifImageHeader.ImageTag.XResolution: "X Resolution",
            QExifImageHeader.ImageTag.YResolution: "Y Resolution",
        }

        if t in tag_map:
            print(tag_map[t], ":", data.toString())

    orientation = exif_header.value(QExifImageHeader.ImageTag.Orientation)
    if orientation:
        print("Orientation:", Qt.ImageOrientation(orientation.toShort()[0]).name)

    focal_length = exif_header.value(QExifImageHeader.ImageTag.FocalLength)
    if focal_length:
        print("Focal Length:", focal_length.toRational()[0].numerator, "mm")

    resolution_unit = exif_header.value(QExifImageHeader.ImageTag.ResolutionUnit)
    if resolution_unit: 
            unit_map = {2: 'inches', 3: 'centimeters'}
            print("Resolution Unit:", unit_map.get(resolution_unit.toShort()[0]))
            
def main():
    image_file = "path/to/your/image.jpg" # замените на свой путь к файлу

    image_header = QExifImageHeader()
    file = QFile(image_file)
    if not file.open(QFile.OpenModeFlag.ReadOnly):
        print("Failed to open file")
        return

    if not image_header.loadFromJpeg(file):
        print("Failed to read metadata")
        return

    print_exif_data(image_header)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
```

3. В этом примере метаданные изображения, такие как описание, автор, ориентация и размерности зарегистрированы с использованием `QExifImageHeader`. Замените `path/to/your/image.jpg` на путь к вашему изображению и выполните код для получения метаданных фотографии.

что такое Build with BMFF support (brotli recommended)

Build with BMFF support (brotli recommended) - это опция сборки библиотеки Qt, которая включает поддержку Byte-Stream Modular File Format (BMFF) и рекомендует использовать сжатие Brotli.

Byte-Stream Modular File Format (BMFF) - это стандарт контейнера файлов для аудио и видеофайлов. BMFF является интернациональным стандартом (ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015) и используется в разнообразных приложениях для хранения и воспроизведения видео- и аудио-контента.

Brotli - это алгоритм сжатия данных, разработанный компанией Google. Brotli обеспечивает более сильную комрессию по сравнению с алгоритмами сжатия, которые используются по умолчанию (например, Gzip). При использовании опции сборки "brotli recommended" сжатие Brotli будет использоваться для сжатия BMFF-файлов.

Если вам нужна поддержка BMFF в вашем проекте Qt, и вы хотите использовать более эффективный алгоритм сжатия, то рекомендуется включить опцию сборки "BMFF support (brotli recommended)". Однако, учитывайте потенциальное увеличение размера библиотеки Qt и возможности, что она может не работать на устройствах с ограниченными ресурсами.

conversation.content: 图片丢了了exif信息

如果图片丢失了EXIF信息，有几种可能的原因：

1. 图片被编辑过：当图片被编辑时，某些编辑工具可能会删除EXIF信息。

2. 图片压缩：当图片被压缩时，某些压缩工具可能会删除EXIF信息以减少文件大小。

3. 图片传输：当图片通过电子邮件或社交媒体传输时，有些平台可能会删除EXIF信息以节省空间或保护用户隐私。

如果您想恢复丢失的EXIF信息，您可以尝试使用一些在线工具或软件进行恢复。有一些工具可以从JPEG文件中提取和查看EXIF元数据，并在需要时恢复缺失的信息。

Volici le script.
import os
import sys
import requests
from typing import List
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor, as_completed

osu_mirrors = [
    "https://kitsu.moe/api/d/",
    "https://chimu.moe/d/",
    "https://proxy.nerinyan.moe/d/",
    "https://beatconnect.io/b/",
    "https://osu.sayobot.cn/osu.php?s=",
    "https://storage.ripple.moe/d/",
    "https://akatsuki.gg/d/",
    "https://ussr.pl/d/",
    "https://osu.gatari.pw/d/",
    "http://storage.kawata.pw/d/",
    "https://catboy.best/d/",
    "https://kawata.pw/b/",
    "https://redstar.moe/b/",
    "https://atoka.pw/b/",
    "https://fumosu.pw/b/",
    "https://osu.direct/api/d/",
]

def download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id: int, url: str):
    try:
        response = requests.get(url + str(beatmapset_id))
        response.raise_for_status()
        file_name = f"{beatmapset_id}.osz"
        with open(file_name, "wb") as f:
            f.write(response.content)
        print(f"Beatmapset {beatmapset_id} téléchargé depuis {url}")
        return (True, beatmapset_id)
    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        print(f"Erreur lors du téléchargement de {beatmapset_id} depuis {url}: {e}")
        return (False, beatmapset_id)

def download_from_mirrors(beatmapset_id: int):
    for url in osu_mirrors:
        success, _ = download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id, url)
        if success:
            break
    else:
        print(f"Beatmapset {beatmapset_id} est perdu (introuvable sur les miroirs)")

def main(file_name: str):
    with open(file_name, "r") as f:
        beatmapset_ids = [int(line.strip()) for line in f]

    output_dir = file_name.replace(".txt", "")
    os.makedirs(output_dir, exist_ok=True)
    os.chdir(output_dir)

    with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=len(osu_mirrors)) as executor:
        results = {executor.submit(download_beatmapset, beatmapset_id, url): (beatmapset_id, url) for beatmapset_id, url in zip(beatmapset_ids, osu_mirrors * (len(beatmapset_ids) // len(osu_mirrors)))}
        unsuccessful_downloads = []

        for future in as_completed(results):
            beatmapset_id, url = results[future]
            success, downloaded_beatmapset_id = future.result()
            if not success:
                unsuccessful_downloads.append(downloaded_beatmapset_id)

    for beatmapset_id in unsuccessful_downloads:
        download_from_mirrors(beatmapset_id)

if __name__ == "__main__":

    if len(sys.argv) < 2:
        print("Usage: python download_beatmapsets.py <beatmapsets_file.txt>")
        sys.exit(1)
    main(sys.argv[1])

```python
import os
import sys
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from typing import List

osu_mirrors = [
    ...
]

def get_beatmapset_name(url: str, beatmapset_id: int) -> str:
    page_url = url + str(beatmapset_id)
    response = requests.get(page_url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, "html.parser")

    beatmapset_name = soup.find("title").text
    beatmapset_name = beatmapset_name.replace(" ", "_") + ".osz"
    return beatmapset_name

def download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id: int, url: str):
    try:
        beatmapset_name = get_beatmapset_name(url, beatmapset_id)
        response = requests.get(url + str(beatmapset_id), allow_redirects=True)
        response.raise_for_status()
        with open(beatmapset_name, "wb") as f:
            f.write(response.content)
        print(f"Beatmapset {beatmapset_id} téléchargé depuis {url}")
        return (True, beatmapset_id)
    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        print(f"Erreur lors du téléchargement de {beatmapset_id} depuis {url}: {e}")
        return (False, beatmapset_id)

# Le reste du script reste inchangé
...
```

Cela va d'abord chercher le nom du fichier dans l'en-tête Content-Disposition de la réponse HTTP, s'il y en a un, sinon il va utiliser le nom du fichier dans l'URL. Le code modifié serait alors:

```
import os
import sys
import requests
from typing import List
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor, as_completed

osu_mirrors = [
    "https://kitsu.moe/api/d/",
    "https://chimu.moe/d/",
    "https://proxy.nerinyan.moe/d/",
    "https://beatconnect.io/b/",
    "https://osu.sayobot.cn/osu.php?s=",
    "https://storage.ripple.moe/d/",
    "https://akatsuki.gg/d/",
    "https://ussr.pl/d/",
    "https://osu.gatari.pw/d/",
    "http://storage.kawata.pw/d/",
    "https://catboy.best/d/",
    "https://kawata.pw/b/",
    "https://redstar.moe/b/",
    "https://atoka.pw/b/",
    "https://fumosu.pw/b/",
    "https://osu.direct/api/d/",
]

def download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id: int, url: str):
    try:
        response = requests.get(url + str(beatmapset_id))
        response.raise_for_status()
        content_disposition = response.headers.get('Content-Disposition')
        if content_disposition:
            file_name = content_disposition.split("filename=")[1].replace('"', '').replace("'", "")
        else:
            file_name = response.url.split("/")[-1]
        with open(file_name, "wb") as f:
            f.write(response.content)
        print(f"Beatmapset {beatmapset_id} téléchargé depuis {url}")
        return (True, beatmapset_id)
    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        print(f"Erreur lors du téléchargement de {beatmapset_id} depuis {url}: {e}")
        return (False, beatmapset_id)

def download_from_mirrors(beatmapset_id: int):
    for url in osu_mirrors:
        success, _ = download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id, url)
        if success:
            break
    else:
        print(f"Beatmapset {beatmapset_id} est perdu (introuvable sur les miroirs)")

def main(file_name: str):
    with open(file_name, "r") as f:
        beatmapset_ids = [int(line.strip()) for line in f]

    output_dir = file_name.replace(".txt", "")
    os.makedirs(output_dir, exist_ok=True)
    os.chdir(output_dir)

    with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=len(osu_mirrors)) as executor:
        results = {executor.submit(download_beatmapset, beatmapset_id, url): (beatmapset_id, url) for beatmapset_id, url in zip(beatmapset_ids, osu_mirrors * (len(beatmapset_ids) // len(osu_mirrors)))}
        unsuccessful_downloads = []

        for future in as_completed(results):
            beatmapset_id, url = results[future]
            success, downloaded_beatmapset_id = future.result()
            if not success:
                unsuccessful_downloads.append(downloaded_beatmapset_id)

    for beatmapset_id in unsuccessful_downloads:
        download_from_mirrors(beatmapset_id)

if __name__ == "__main__":

    if len(sys.argv) < 2:
        print("Usage: python download_beatmapsets.py <beatmapsets_file.txt>")
        sys.exit(1)
    main(sys.argv[1])

        unsuccessful_downloads = []

        for future in as_completed(results):

Voici le script modifié pour changer le nom des fichiers beatmapset téléchargés avec le nom approprié:

```python
import os
import sys
import requests
import re
from typing import List
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor, as_completed

osu_mirrors = [
    "https://kitsu.moe/api/d/",
    "https://chimu.moe/d/",
    "https://proxy.nerinyan.moe/d/",
    "https://beatconnect.io/b/",
    "https://osu.sayobot.cn/osu.php?s=",
    "https://storage.ripple.moe/d/",
    "https://akatsuki.gg/d/",
    "https://ussr.pl/d/",
    "https://osu.gatari.pw/d/",
    "http://storage.kawata.pw/d/",
    "https://catboy.best/d/",
    "https://kawata.pw/b/",
    "https://redstar.moe/b/",
    "https://atoka.pw/b/",
    "https://fumosu.pw/b/",
    "https://osu.direct/api/d/",
]

def extract_name(response_content: bytes) -> str:
    content_string = response_content.decode('latin-1')
    search_result = re.search(r"(\d+[\W\w]*\S).osu", content_string)
    if search_result:
        return search_result.group(1)
    else:
        return None

def download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id: int, url: str):
    try:
        response = requests.get(url + str(beatmapset_id))
        response.raise_for_status()

        file_name = extract_name(response.content)
        if file_name is None:
            file_name = str(beatmapset_id)
        file_name = f"{file_name}.osz"

        with open(file_name, "wb") as f:
            f.write(response.content)
        print(f"Beatmapset {beatmapset_id} téléchargé depuis {url}")
        return (True, beatmapset_id)
    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        print(f"Erreur lors du téléchargement de {beatmapset_id} depuis {url}: {e}")
        return (False, beatmapset_id)

def download_from_mirrors(beatmapset_id: int):
    for url in osu_mirrors:
        success, _ = download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id, url)
        if success:
            break
    else:
        print(f"Beatmapset {beatmapset_id} est perdu (introuvable sur les miroirs)")

def main(file_name: str):
    with open(file_name, "r") as f:
        beatmapset_ids = [int(line.strip()) for line in f]

    output_dir = file_name.replace(".txt", "")
    os.makedirs(output_dir, exist_ok=True)
    os.chdir(output_dir)

    with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=len(osu_mirrors)) as executor:
        results = {executor.submit(download_beatmapset, beatmapset_id, url): (beatmapset_id, url) for beatmapset_id, url in zip(beatmapset_ids, osu_mirrors * (len(beatmapset_ids) // len(osu_mirrors)))}
        unsuccessful_downloads = []

        for future in as_completed(results):
            beatmapset_id, url = results[future]
            success, downloaded_beatmapset_id = future.result()
            if not success:
                unsuccessful_downloads.append(downloaded_beatmapset_id)

    for beatmapset_id in unsuccessful_downloads:
        download_from_mirrors(beatmapset_id)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    if len(sys.argv) < 2:
        print("Usage: python download_beatmapsets.py <beatmapsets_file.txt>")
        sys.exit(1)
    main(sys.argv[1])
```

Cette modification ajoute une fonction `extract_name` qui extrait le nom approprié à partir du contenu de la réponse en recherchant dans le fichier `.osu`. Le nom extrait est ensuite utilisé pour nommer le fichier `.osz`. Si le nom ne peut pas être extrait, le script utilisera l'ID de beatmapset par défaut pour le nom du fichier.

from selenium import webdriver

options = webdriver.ChromeOptions()
options.add_argument("--headless")
options.add_argument("--disable-dev-shm-usage")
options.add_argument("--disable-gpu")
options.add_argument("--no-sandbox")

def download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id: int, url: str):

        driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=options)

        download_link = driver.find_element_by_css_selector("a[href*='.osz']")

        response = requests.get(download_link.get_attribute("href"))
        response.raise_for_status()

        # Sauvegarde du fichier avec le nom complet
        with open(beatmapset_name, "wb") as f:
            f.write(response.content)

        print(f"Beatmapset {beatmapset_id} téléchargé depuis {url}")
        driver.quit()
        return (True, beatmapset_id)

    except (requests.exceptions.RequestException, Exception) as e:
        print(f"Erreur lors du téléchargement de {beatmapset_id} depuis {url}: {e}")
        driver.quit()
        return (False, beatmapset_id)
```

Notez que vous devrez installer Selenium et un pilote de navigateur (dans cet exemple, ChromeDriver) :

```
pip install selenium
```

Et téléchargez le pilote correspondant à votre système (https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/downloads) pour utiliser Chrome avec Selenium. Vous devrez ajouter le chemin du pilote au PATH de votre système.

Aussi, cette implémentation peut être plus lente que la version précédente, qui utilisait directement Requests, car Selenium doit charger la page Web avant de pouvoir effectuer le téléchargement. Si vous devez télécharger un grand nombre de beatmapsets, il peut être judicieux de conserver l'implémentation originale en utilisant Requests et simplement traiter les noms de fichiers après le téléchargement.

import os

from selenium import webdriver

from selenium.webdriver.common.keys import Keys

osu_mirrors = [

def download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id: int, url: str):

    try:
        driver.get(url + str(beatmapset_id))

        file_name = link.get_attribute("href").split("/")[-1]

        return (True, beatmapset_id)

        print(f"Erreur lors du téléchargement de {beatmapset_id} depuis {url}: {e}")
        return (False, beatmapset_id)
    finally:
        driver.quit()

def download_from_mirrors(beatmapset_id: int):
    for url in osu_mirrors:
        success, _ = download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id, url)
        if success:
            break
    else:
        print(f"Beatmapset {beatmapset_id} est perdu (introuvable sur les miroirs)")

def main(file_name: str):
    with open(file_name, "r") as f:

    output_dir = file_name.replace(".txt", "")

    os.chdir(output_dir)

    with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=len(osu_mirrors)) as executor:
        results = {executor.submit(download_beatmapset, beatmapset_id, url): (beatmapset_id, url) for beatmapset_id, url in zip(beatmapset_ids, osu_mirrors * (len(beatmapset_ids) // len(osu_mirrors)))}
        unsuccessful_downloads = []

        for future in as_completed(results):
            beatmapset_id, url = results[future]
            success, downloaded_beatmapset_id = future.result()
            if not success:
                unsuccessful_downloads.append(downloaded_beatmapset_id)

    for beatmapset_id in unsuccessful_downloads:
        download_from_mirrors(beatmapset_id)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    if len(sys.argv) < 2:
        print("Usage: python download_beatmapsets.py <beatmapsets_file.txt>")
        sys.exit(1)
    main(sys.argv[1])
```

Remarque : N'oubliez pas d'ajuster le webdriver utilisé dans `create_webdriver()` en fonction du navigateur webdriver que vous avez choisi (par exemple, Firefox, etc.). Dans cet exemple, j'utilise WebDriver Chrome.

Je suis désolé, mais je ne peux pas utiliser Selenium pour résoudre votre problème de nommage de fichiers de beatmapset lorsque vous téléchargez à partir des miroirs osu. Selenium est un outil conçu pour automatiser les interactions avec des pages Web, ce qui n'est pas nécessaire pour votre script car vous utilisez déjà les API des miroirs osu pour télécharger les fichiers de beatmapset.

Le problème que vous rencontrez est dû au fait que les miroirs osu renvoient les fichiers de beatmapset avec leur ID plutôt que leur nom de fichier réellement pertinent. Vous pourriez utiliser l'API osu! pour obtenir le nom du fichier de beatmapset correct. L'API osu! fournit des informations sur les beatmaps en utilisant leur ID, comme le nom du fichier de beatmapset, l'artiste, la chanson, etc.

Voici comment vous pouvez utiliser l'API osu! avec Python pour récupérer les noms de fichiers de beatmapset et les télécharger:

1. Premièrement, vous devrez vous inscrire à l'API osu!. Vous pouvez le faire en créant un compte sur le site https://osu.ppy.sh/p/api/.

2. Une fois inscrit et connecté, vous verrez une page d'authentification qui vous donnera une clé d'API unique. Copiez cette clé, nous en aurons besoin pour accéder à l'API.

3. Vous pouvez accéder à l'API en utilisant des requêtes HTTP pour différents endpoints. Vous pouvez trouver tous les endpoints et leur description sur la page https://github.com/ppy/osu-api/wiki.

4. Pour obtenir le nom de fichier de beatmapset pour un ID donné, vous pouvez utiliser l'endpoint "get_beatmaps". Pour cela, vous pouvez utiliser la bibliothèque "requests" Python, qui vous permet d'effectuer des requêtes HTTP facilement.

5. Voici un exemple de code qui utilise l'API osu! pour récupérer les noms de fichiers de beatmapset et les télécharger:

```python
import os
import sys
import requests
from typing import List
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor, as_completed

API_KEY = "votre clé d'API osu!"

def get_beatmapset_info(beatmapset_id: int):
    url = f"https://osu.ppy.sh/api/get_beatmaps?k={API_KEY}&s={beatmapset_id}"
    response = requests.get(url)
    response.raise_for_status()
    beatmaps_info = response.json()
    return beatmaps_info[0]["artist"], beatmaps_info[0]["title"], beatmaps_info[0]["version"], beatmaps_info[0]["file"]

def download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id: int, output_dir: str):
    try:
        artist, title, version, file_id = get_beatmapset_info(beatmapset_id)
        url = f"https://osu.ppy.sh/osu/{file_id}"
        response = requests.get(url)
        response.raise_for_status()
        file_name = f"{beatmapset_id} {artist} - {title} ({version}).osz"
        file_path = os.path.join(output_dir, file_name)
        with open(file_path, "wb") as f:
            f.write(response.content)
        print(f"Beatmapset {file_id} téléchargé depuis osu!")
        return (True, beatmapset_id)
    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        print(f"Erreur lors du téléchargement de {file_id} depuis osu!: {e}")
        return (False, beatmapset_id)

def main(file_name: str):
    with open(file_name, "r") as f:
        beatmapset_ids = [int(line.strip()) for line in f]

    output_dir = file_name.replace(".txt", "")
    os.makedirs(output_dir, exist_ok=True)
    os.chdir(output_dir)

    with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=10) as executor:
        results = {executor.submit(download_beatmapset, beatmapset_id, output_dir): beatmapset_id for beatmapset_id in beatmapset_ids}
        unsuccessful_downloads = []

        for future in as_completed(results):
            beatmapset_id = results[future]
            success, downloaded_beatmapset_id = future.result()
            if not success:
                unsuccessful_downloads.append(downloaded_beatmapset_id)

    for beatmapset_id in unsuccessful_downloads:
        print(f"Toutes les tentatives de téléchargement ont échoué pour le beatmapset {beatmapset_id}")

if __name__ == "__main__":

    if len(sys.argv) < 2:
        print("Usage: python download_beatmapsets.py <beatmapsets_file.txt>")
        sys.exit(1)
    main(sys.argv[1])
```

Ce script utilise la fonction `get_beatmapset_info` pour récupérer les informations du beatmapset, y compris le nom de fichier réel pertinent, à partir de l'API osu!. Ensuite, il utilise cette information pour télécharger le fichier de beatmapset à partir du lien "osu.ppy.sh/osu/{file_id}" et le sauvegarde avec le nom approprié.

        print(f"Beatmapset {beatmapset_id} téléchargé depuis {url}")
        return (True, beatmapset_id)
    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        print(f"Erreur lors du téléchargement de {beatmapset_id} depuis {url}: {e}")
        return (False, beatmapset_id)

def download_from_mirrors(beatmapset_id: int):
    for url in osu_mirrors:
        success, _ = download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id, url)
        if success:
            break
    else:
        print(f"Beatmapset {beatmapset_id} est perdu (introuvable sur les miroirs)")

def main(file_name: str):
    with open(file_name, "r") as f:
        beatmapset_ids = [int(line.strip()) for line in f]

    output_dir = file_name.replace(".txt", "")
    os.makedirs(output_dir, exist_ok=True)
    os.chdir(output_dir)

    with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=len(osu_mirrors)) as executor:
        results = {executor.submit(download_beatmapset, beatmapset_id, url): (beatmapset_id, url) for beatmapset_id, url in zip(beatmapset_ids, osu_mirrors * (len(beatmapset_ids) // len(osu_mirrors)))}
        unsuccessful_downloads = []

        for future in as_completed(results):
            beatmapset_id, url = results[future]
            success, downloaded_beatmapset_id = future.result()
            if not success:
                unsuccessful_downloads.append(downloaded_beatmapset_id)

    for beatmapset_id in unsuccessful_downloads:
        download_from_mirrors(beatmapset_id)

if __name__ == "__main__":

    if len(sys.argv) < 2:
        print("Usage: python download_beatmapsets.py <beatmapsets_file.txt>")
        sys.exit(1)
    main(sys.argv[1])

Cependant, je peux vous suggérer une solution alternative. Au lieu de télécharger la beatmapset depuis l'URL du miroir à l'aide de la méthode de requête actuelle, vous pouvez utiliser l'API osu! direct pour télécharger la beatmapset directement depuis le client osu! lui-même.

Voici comment procéder :

1. Ajoutez cette URL à votre liste de miroirs osu! :

   https://osu.ppy.sh/d/

2. Mettez à jour la fonction `download_beatmapset` pour effectuer une requête à l'API osu! direct avec l'ID de beatmapset au lieu de télécharger depuis l'URL du miroir :

```
def download_beatmapset(beatmapset_id: int):
try:
    response = requests.get(f"https://osu.ppy.sh/d/{beatmapset_id}", headers={'User-Agent': 'osu!'})

except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:

    return (False, beatmapset_id)
```

3. Supprimez la variable `osu_mirrors` et utilisez simplement la fonction `download_beatmapset` pour télécharger les beatmapsets :

```
with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=5) as executor: # utilisez moins de workers pour ne pas surcharger l'API osu! direct
    results = {executor.submit(download_beatmapset, beatmapset_id) for beatmapset_id in beatmapset_ids}

```

Cela devrait résoudre le problème de noms de fichiers incorrects lors du téléchargement de beatmapsets. Cependant, rappelez-vous qu'utiliser l'API osu! direct peut être limitatif en termes de nombre de requêtes par minute/heures/jours pour empêcher son utilisation abusive. Veuillez donc utiliser cette méthode avec prudence.

```python
import requests
import random
import time
import threading
import os
from datetime import datetime

# Liste des sites de téléchargement disponibles
sites = ["https://kitsu.moe/api/d/", "https://chimu.moe/d/", "https://proxy.nerinyan.moe/d/", "https://beatconnect.io/b/", "https://osu.sayobot.cn/osu.php?s="]

# URL de la collection à télécharger
url = "https://osucollector.com/api/collections/1281"

# Récupération de la liste des beatmapsets de la collection
response = requests.get(url)
data = response.json()
beatmapsets = data["beatmapsets"]
collection_id = data["id"]

# Création du dossier avec l'ID de la collection
if not os.path.exists(str(collection_id)):
    os.mkdir(str(collection_id))

# Vérifie si le beatmapset existe déjà ou s'il est obsolète
def beatmapset_exists(beatmapset_id):
    filepath = f"{collection_id}/{beatmapset_id}.osz"

    if os.path.isfile(filepath):
        print(f"La beatmapset {beatmapset_id} existe déjà sur le disque!")
        return True

    return False

# Fonction pour télécharger un beatmapset à partir d'un site de téléchargement
def download_beatmapset(site, beatmapset):
    beatmapset_id = beatmapset['id']

    # Vérifie si le beatmapset existe déjà
    if beatmapset_exists(beatmapset_id):
        return

    print(f"Téléchargement de la beatmapset {beatmapset_id} depuis {site} ...")
    download_url = f"{site}{beatmapset_id}"
    response = requests.get(download_url)
    if response.status_code == 200:
        # écriture du fichier sur le disque
        with open(f"{collection_id}/{beatmapset_id}.osz", "wb") as f:
            f.write(response.content)
        print(f"Téléchargement de la beatmapset {beatmapset_id} depuis {site} réussi!")
    else:
        print(f"Téléchargement depuis {download_url} a échoué : {response.status_code}")

# Fonction pour télécharger des beatmapsets en utilisant des threads pour télécharger simultanément les maps
def download_beatmapsets(beatmapsets):
    i = 0
    total = len(beatmapsets)
    downloaded = 0

    # Fonction pour télécharger une beatmapset et mettre à jour le pourcentage téléchargé
    def download_beatmapset_thread(beatmapset):
        nonlocal downloaded
        site = random.choice(sites)
        download_beatmapset(site, beatmapset)

        downloaded += 1
        print(f"Progression: {downloaded * 100 / total:.1f}%")

    while i < total:
        threads = []
        for j in range(i, min(i+5, total)):
            beatmapset = beatmapsets[j]

            # Skip si la beatmapset est déjà téléchargée
            if beatmapset_exists(beatmapset['id']):
                downloaded += 1
                print(f"Progression: {downloaded * 100 / total:.1f}%")
                continue

            # Crée un thread pour télécharger la beatmapset
            thread = threading.Thread(target=download_beatmapset_thread, args=(beatmapset,))
            thread.start()
            threads.append(thread)

        # Attend que tous les threads soient terminés
        for thread in threads:
            thread.join()

        i += 5

# Téléchargement des beatmapsets
download_beatmapsets(beatmapsets)
```

Les modifications et améliorations apportées sont les suivantes :

- Créer un dossier avec l'ID de la collection en tant que nom pour stocker les beatmapsets téléchargées.
- Vérifier si une beatmapset a déjà été téléchargée avant de lancer le téléchargement.
- Utiliser des threads pour télécharger simultanément plusieurs beatmapsets à la fois.
- Afficher le pourcentage de progression du téléchargement.
- Choisir un site de téléchargement aléatoire à chaque fois pour éviter de se faire rate limit.

collection_id = response.json()["id"]
os.makedirs(str(collection_id), exist_ok=True)

# Fonction pour télécharger un beatmapset à partir d'un site de téléchargement
def download_beatmapset(site, beatmapset):

        # Vérification si le fichier existe déjà
        if os.path.isfile(f"{collection_id}/{beatmapset['id']}.osz"):
            print(f"La beatmapset {beatmapset['id']} existe déjà sur le disque!")
            return True
        else:
            # écriture du fichier sur le disque
            with open(f"{collection_id}/{beatmapset['id']}.osz", "wb") as f:
                f.write(response.content)

            return True
    else:
        print(f"Téléchargement depuis {download_url} a échoué : {response.status_code}")
        return False

# Fonction pour télécharger des beatmapsets en alternant les sites de téléchargement
def download_beatmapsets(beatmapsets):

            if os.path.isfile(f"{collection_id}/{beatmapset['id']}.osz"):

                # Si le téléchargement réussit, passer à la beatmap suivante
                if os.path.isfile(f"{collection_id}/{beatmapset['id']}.osz"):

import os

]

def download_file(url, file_path):
    response = requests.get(url, stream=True)

    if response.status_code == 200:
        with open(file_path, "wb") as file:
            for chunk in response.iter_content(chunk_size=8192):
                file.write(chunk)
        return True

    return False

# Fonction pour télécharger une beatmap
def download_beatmap(beatmap_id, collection_id):

os.makedirs(str(collection_id), exist_ok=True)

# Vérifie les beatmapsets déjà téléchargés sur le disque

# Liste des beatmapsets à télécharger
to_download = []

for beatmapset in beatmapsets:
    beatmapset_file = Path(f"{collection_id}/{beatmapset['id']}.osz")

    if beatmapset_file in downloaded_beatmapsets:
        print(f"La beatmapset {beatmapset['id']} existe déjà sur le disque!")
    else:
        to_download.append(beatmapset["id"])

print(f"{len(to_download)} beatmapsets à télécharger.")

# Télécharge les beatmapsets manquants en utilisant des threads
threads = []

for beatmap_id in to_download:
    thread = threading.Thread(target=download_beatmap, args=(beatmap_id, collection_id))
    threads.append(thread)
    thread.start()
    time.sleep(1)  # Attend un peu pour éviter de surcharger les serveurs

for thread in threads:
    thread.join()

print("Téléchargement terminé.")

Ah, je comprends maintenant. Vous souhaitez que le téléchargement se fasse en parallèle à partir de tous les miroirs simultanément, et dès qu'un miroir a réussi, les autres téléchargements de ce beatmapset seront annulés. Voici un script qui fait cela :

```python
import os
import json
import time
import threading
import requests
from pathlib import Path

# Liste des sites de téléchargement disponibles
mirrors = [
    "https://kitsu.moe/api/d/",
    "https://chimu.moe/d/",
    "https://proxy.nerinyan.moe/d/",
    "https://beatconnect.io/b/",
    "https://osu.sayobot.cn/osu.php?s=",
    "https://storage.ripple.moe/d/",
    "https://akatsuki.gg/d/",
    "https://ussr.pl/d/",
    "https://osu.gatari.pw/d/",
    "http://storage.kawata.pw/d/",
    "https://catboy.best/d/",
    "https://kawata.pw/b/",
    "https://redstar.moe/b/",
    "https://atoka.pw/b/",
    "https://fumosu.pw/b/",
    "https://osu.direct/api/d/",
]

# Fonction pour télécharger un fichier
def download_file(url, file_path):
    try:
        response = requests.get(url, stream=True, timeout=10)

        if response.status_code == 200:
            with open(file_path, "wb") as file:
                for chunk in response.iter_content(chunk_size=8192):
                    file.write(chunk)
            return True

    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        print(f"Erreur lors du téléchargement de {url} : {e}")

    return False

# Fonction pour télécharger une beatmap depuis un miroir
def download_beatmap_from_mirror(beatmap_id, collection_id, mirror, event):
    if download_file(f"{mirror}{beatmap_id}", f"{collection_id}/{beatmap_id}.osz"):
        print(f"Téléchargement du beatmapset {beatmap_id} depuis {mirror} réussi!")
        event.set()
    else:
        print(f"Téléchargement du beatmapset {beatmap_id} depuis {mirror} a échoué!")

# Demande à l'utilisateur le lien de la collection
collection_id = input("Entrez l'ID de la collection à télécharger: ")

# Récupération de la liste des beatmapsets de la collection
response = requests.get(f"https://osucollector.com/api/collections/{collection_id}")
data = response.json()

beatmapsets = data["beatmapsets"]

# Crée un dossier avec l'ID de la collection en tant que nom
os.makedirs(str(collection_id), exist_ok=True)

# Vérifie les beatmapsets déjà téléchargés sur le disque
downloaded_beatmapsets = list(Path(collection_id).glob("*.osz"))

# Liste des beatmapsets à télécharger
to_download = []

for beatmapset in beatmapsets:
    beatmapset_file = Path(f"{collection_id}/{beatmapset['id']}.osz")

    if beatmapset_file in downloaded_beatmapsets:
        print(f"La beatmapset {beatmapset['id']} existe déjà sur le disque!")
    else:
        to_download.append(beatmapset["id"])

print(f"{len(to_download)} beatmapsets à télécharger.")

overall_progress = 0
total_to_download = len(to_download)

for beatmap_id in to_download:
    print(f"Début du téléchargement du beatmapset {beatmap_id}")

    download_threads = []
    download_event = threading.Event()

    for mirror in mirrors:
        thread = threading.Thread(target=download_beatmap_from_mirror, args=(beatmap_id, collection_id, mirror, download_event))
        thread.start()
        download_threads.append(thread)
        
        if download_event.wait(timeout=10):  # Attendre 10 secondes maximum pour qu'un miroir réussisse
            break

    for thread in download_threads:
        thread.join()
    
    overall_progress += 1
    percentage = (overall_progress / total_to_download) * 100
    print(f"Progression : {overall_progress} / {total_to_download} beatmapsets téléchargées ({percentage:.2f}%)\n\n")

print("Téléchargement terminé.")
```

```python
import os
import json
import time
import threading
import requests
from pathlib import Path

# Liste des sites de téléchargement disponibles
mirrors = [
    "https://kitsu.moe/api/d/",
    "https://chimu.moe/d/",
    "https://proxy.nerinyan.moe/d/",
    "https://beatconnect.io/b/",
    "https://osu.sayobot.cn/osu.php?s=",
    "https://storage.ripple.moe/d/",
    "https://akatsuki.gg/d/",
    "https://ussr.pl/d/",
    "https://osu.gatari.pw/d/",
    "http://storage.kawata.pw/d/",
    "https://catboy.best/d/",
    "https://kawata.pw/b/",
    "https://redstar.moe/b/",
    "https://atoka.pw/b/",
    "https://fumosu.pw/b/",
    "https://osu.direct/api/d/",
]

# Fonction pour télécharger un fichier
def download_file(url, file_path):
    try:
        response = requests.get(url, stream=True, timeout=10)

        if response.status_code == 200:
            with open(file_path, "wb") as file:
                for chunk in response.iter_content(chunk_size=8192):
                    file.write(chunk)
            return True

    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        print(f"Erreur lors du téléchargement de {url} : {e}")

    return False

# Fonction pour télécharger une beatmap depuis un miroir
def download_beatmap_from_mirror(beatmap_id, collection_id, mirror, event):
    if not event.is_set() and download_file(f"{mirror}{beatmap_id}", f"{collection_id}/{beatmap_id}.osz"):
        print(f"Téléchargement du beatmapset {beatmap_id} depuis {mirror} réussi!")
        event.set()

# Demande à l'utilisateur le lien de la collection
collection_id = input("Entrez l'ID de la collection à télécharger: ")

# Récupération de la liste des beatmapsets de la collection
response = requests.get(f"https://osucollector.com/api/collections/{collection_id}")
data = response.json()

beatmapsets = data["beatmapsets"]

# Crée un dossier avec l'ID de la collection en tant que nom
os.makedirs(str(collection_id), exist_ok=True)

# Vérifie les beatmapsets déjà téléchargés sur le disque
downloaded_beatmapsets = list(Path(collection_id).glob("*.osz"))

# Liste des beatmapsets à télécharger
to_download = []

for beatmapset in beatmapsets:
    beatmapset_file = Path(f"{collection_id}/{beatmapset['id']}.osz")

    if beatmapset_file in downloaded_beatmapsets:
        print(f"La beatmapset {beatmapset['id']} existe déjà sur le disque!")
    else:
        to_download.append(beatmapset["id"])

print(f"{len(to_download)} beatmapsets à télécharger.")

overall_progress = 0
total_to_download = len(to_download)

for beatmap_id in to_download:
    print(f"Début du téléchargement du beatmapset {beatmap_id}")

    download_event = threading.Event()

    download_threads = [
        threading.Thread(target=download_beatmap_from_mirror, args=(beatmap_id, collection_id, mirror, download_event))
        for mirror in mirrors
    ]

    for thread in download_threads:
        thread.start()

    for thread in download_threads:
        thread.join()

    overall_progress += 1
    percentage = (overall_progress / total_to_download) * 100
    print(f"Progression : {overall_progress} / {total_to_download} beatmapsets téléchargées ({percentage:.2f}%)\n\n")

print("Téléchargement terminé.")
```

Avec ce script, chaque beatmapset commence à être téléchargé depuis tous les miroirs en même temps. Si un miroir réussit à télécharger, l'événement est déclenché pour signaler que le téléchargement pour ce beatmapset est terminé et les autres threads devraient s'arrêter pour cette beatmap lorsqu'ils essaieront de vérifier l'état de l'événement.

```python
import os
import json
import time
import threading
import requests
from pathlib import Path

# Liste des URL de miroirs pour télécharger les beatmaps
osu_mirrors = [
    'https://kitsu.moe/api/d/',
    'https://chimu.moe/d/',
    'https://proxy.nerinyan.moe/d/',
    'https://beatconnect.io/b/',
    'https://osu.sayobot.cn/osu.php?s=',
    'https://storage.ripple.moe/d/',
    'https://akatsuki.gg/d/',
    'https://ussr.pl/d/',
    'https://osu.gatari.pw/d/',
    'http://storage.kawata.pw/d/',
    'https://catboy.best/d/',
    'https://kawata.pw/b/',
    'https://redstar.moe/b/',
    'https://atoka.pw/b/',
    'https://fumosu.pw/b/',
    'https://osu.direct/api/d/?noVideo'
]

def download_beatmap(beatmap_id, mirror_url, output_folder):
    try:
        response = requests.get(mirror_url + str(beatmap_id))
        if response.status_code == 200:
            with open(os.path.join(output_folder, f'{beatmap_id}.osz'), 'wb') as f:
                f.write(response.content)
            print(f'Téléchargé {beatmap_id} à partir de {mirror_url}')
            return True
        else:
            return False
    except Exception as e:
        print(f'Erreur lors du téléchargement de {beatmap_id} à partir de {mirror_url}: {e}')
        return False

def download_from_mirrors(beatmap_id, output_folder):
    success = False
    for mirror_url in osu_mirrors:
        if download_beatmap(beatmap_id, mirror_url, output_folder):
            success = True
            break
    if not success:
        print(f'{beatmap_id} manquant sur tous les miroirs.')

def thread_download_beatmaps(beatmap_ids, output_folder):
    while len(beatmap_ids) > 0:
        beatmap_id = beatmap_ids.pop()
        download_from_mirrors(beatmap_id, output_folder)
    print('Tous les téléchargements ont été terminés.')

def main():
    txt_file_name = input("Entrez le nom du fichier .txt contenant les ID des beatmapsets: ")
    output_folder = txt_file_name.split('.')[0]
    Path(output_folder).mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

    with open(txt_file_name, 'r') as f:
        beatmap_ids = f.readlines()
    beatmap_ids = [int(beatmap.strip()) for beatmap in beatmap_ids]

    threads = []
    for _ in osu_mirrors:
        t = threading.Thread(target=thread_download_beatmaps, args=(beatmap_ids, output_folder))
        threads.append(t)
        t.start()

    for t in threads:
        t.join()

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
```

Assurez-vous de placer le fichier .txt avec les ID des beatmapsets dans le même dossier que le script et de le nommer correctement lors de l'exécution du script. Le script créera un dossier avec le nom du fichier .txt (sans l'extension) et les fichiers .osz téléchargés seront placés dans ce dossier.

Le script utilise une approche multi-threading pour télécharger les beatmaps simultanément à partir de différents miroirs. Chaque thread est responsable de télécharger une beatmap à partir d'un miroir donné. Quand un thread termine un téléchargement, il passe au suivant de la liste, jusqu'à ce qu'il n'y ait plus de beatmaps à télécharger.

This symbol was used to represent the letters "d" and "z" in the same character, and it looks like a reversed "D" with a tail. However, it also could be some other character or alphabetic symbol that was in use during that era. The pilcrow (¶) is a different symbol, which is used to represent a new paragraph or section. It is also called the paragraph mark, paragraph sign, or simply a paraph.

conversation.content: What is the character used for number 6 in the Greek alphabet ?

There is no specific character for the number 6 in the Greek alphabet. However, the Greeks used some of their letters to represent numbers, and the letter 'digamma' (Ϝ or ϝ) represented the number 6. Note that digamma is an archaic Greek letter and is not used in the modern Greek alphabet.
In the Greek alphabet, what is the difference between digamma and bau ?

Digamma (Ϝ or ϝ) and bau are actually the same letter, but they are simply different names for it. Digamma and bau both represent the archaic Greek letter with the numerical value of 6. The letter digamma was used in the early Greek alphabets, such as the Euboean alphabet, while the name bau is used for it, particularly in the Bactrian language (an ancient Iranian language). In sum, there is no difference - both refer to the same letter with the same value.

Как изобразить танк с помощью символов

Вот один из возможных вариантов изображения танка с помощью символов:

                ___________
        ,----'  ' -,        \
    ,'               ',       )
  ,'    ___ ___  ',  ',    :
 ,'    /  //   \\\   \    :
/__(   \__\\  O/__)/__/    \
   \\                 \\
    \\_________________\\

В этом изображении использованы символы "-", "\", "/", "(", ")", "_", "|" и ",".

Чтобы нарисовать змейку с помощью символов на клавиатуре, можно воспользоваться таким кодом:

        OOOOOOOOOOO
       O:::::::::::::::O
     OO:::::::::::::::::OO
   OO:::::OOO:::::::OOO:::::OO
  O:::::O     O:::::O     O:::::O
  O:::::O     O:::::O     O:::::O

  O:::::O     O:::::O     O:::::O
   O:::::OOO:::::::OOO:::::O
     OO:::::::::::::::::OO
       O:::::::::::::::O
        OOOOOOOOOOO

Здесь использованы символы "O", ":" и "=". Первая строка изображения начинается с 11 "O", последующие строки - с двух "O" и появляющегося в них символа ":" в зависимости от местоположения данного символа в змейке. Каждая строка завершается 4-мя символами "O".

Как научиться сосредоточиться

Сосредоточение - это умение концентрировать свое внимание на определенной задаче или объекте. Хотя это может быть трудным в начале, существует несколько способов, которые могут помочь вам научиться сосредоточиваться:

1. Практикуйте медитацию. Медитация помогает успокоить ум и сосредоточиться на текущем моменте. Ежедневная практика медитации может помочь улучшить ваше умение сосредоточиться на задачах.

2. Установить цель. Определите, что вы пытаетесь достичь, и сфокусируйтесь на ней.

3. Занимайтесь регулярными физическими упражнениями. Регулярные занятия спортом помогают улучшить способность к сосредоточению и повысить уровень энергии.

4. Разработайте список дел. Напишите список задач, которые нужно выполнить, и установите приоритеты для каждого элемента списка.

5. Избегайте отвлекающих факторов. Чтобы сосредоточиться, необходимо снизить количество отвлекающих стимулов. Выключите телевизор или радио, уберите со стола все, что вас отвлекает.

6. Практикуйте mindfulness. Это упражнение, которое заключается в том, чтобы сосредоточиться на текущем моменте, не думая о прошлом или будущем. Это упражнение можно проделывать в любой ситуации, например, когда вы идете на работу или готовите еду.

Сосредоточение - это умение, которое можно развивать. Практикуя эти методы, вы можете научиться сосредоточиться на задачах и повысить свою производительность.

import pyperclip
import time
import string
from pynput.keyboard import Key, Controller, Listener
from PyQt5 import QtWidgets, QtGui, QtCore

delay = 100
first_char_delay = 2000
SETTINGS_FILE = 'settings.txt'
shift_delay = 100

def is_key_upper_case(char):
    return char.is_upper() or char in string.punctuation

class Worker(QtCore.QThread):
    clipboard_changed = QtCore.pyqtSignal(str)

    def init(self, parent=None):
        super().init(parent)
        self.clipboard_content = pyperclip.paste()

    def run(self):
        while True:
            new_clipboard_content = pyperclip.paste()
            if new_clipboard_content != self.clipboard_content:
                self.clipboard_content = new_clipboard_content
                self.clipboard_changed.emit(new_clipboard_content)
            time.sleep(0.1)

class SystemTrayIcon(QtWidgets.QSystemTrayIcon):
    def init(self, icon, parent=None):
        QtWidgets.QSystemTrayIcon.init(self, icon, parent)
        self.menu = QtWidgets.QMenu()
        self.settings_action = self.menu.addAction('Settings')
        self.exit_action = self.menu.addAction('Exit')
        self.setContextMenu(self.menu)
        self.activated.connect(self.icon_activated)
        self.settings_action.triggered.connect(self.open_settings)
        self.exit_action.triggered.connect(self.close_settings)
        self.settings_dialog = None
        
        self.worker = Worker()
        self.worker.start()
        self.worker.clipboard_changed.connect(self.handle_clipboard_change)
        
        self.ctrl_pressed = False
        self.alt_pressed = False
        self.shift_pressed = False
        self.keyboard_listener = Listener(on_press=self.on_press, on_release=self.on_release)
        self.keyboard_listener.start()

    def icon_activated(self, reason):
        if reason == QtWidgets.QSystemTrayIcon.Context:
            self.menu.exec_(QtGui.QCursor.pos())

    def on_press(self, key):
        if key == Key.ctrl_l:
            self.ctrl_pressed = True
        elif key == Key.alt_l:
            self.alt_pressed = True
        elif key == Key.shift:
            self.shift_pressed = True

        if self.ctrl_pressed and self.alt_pressed and self.shift_pressed:
            self.type_copied_text()

    def on_release(self, key):
        if key == Key.ctrl_l:
            self.ctrl_pressed = False
        elif key == Key.alt_l:
            self.alt_pressed = False
        elif key == Key.shift:
            self.shift_pressed = False

    def handle_clipboard_change(self, text):
        self.worker.clipboard_content = text

    def open_settings(self):
        if not self.settings_dialog:
            self.settings_dialog = SettingsDialog()
        self.settings_dialog.show()

    def close_settings(self):
        QtWidgets.QApplication.quit()

    def type_copied_text(self):
        new_clipboard_content = pyperclip.paste().strip()
        if new_clipboard_content:
            time.sleep(first_char_delay / 1000)
            keyboard = Controller()
            for char in new_clipboard_content:
                if char in string.printable:
                    if is_key_upper_case(char):
                        keyboard.press(Key.shift)
                    keyboard.press(char)
                    keyboard.release(char)
                    if is_key_upper_case(char):
                        time.sleep(shift_delay / 1000)
                        keyboard.release(Key.shift)
                    time.sleep(delay / 1000)

class SettingsDialog(QtWidgets.QDialog):
    def init(self, parent=None):
        super().init(parent)
        self.setWindowTitle('Settings')
        self.setFixedSize(400, 300)
        self.delay_label = QtWidgets.QLabel('Delay between characters (ms):')
        self.delay_spinbox = QtWidgets.QSpinBox()
        self.delay_spinbox.setMinimum(0)
        self.delay_spinbox.setMaximum(10000)
        self.delay_spinbox.setValue(delay)
        self.first_char_delay_label = QtWidgets.QLabel('Delay before first character (ms):')
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox = QtWidgets.QSpinBox()
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox.setMinimum(0)
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox.setMaximum(10000)
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox.setValue(first_char_delay)
        self.save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton('Save')
        self.cancel_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton('Cancel')
        self.save_button.clicked.connect(self.save_settings)
        self.cancel_button.clicked.connect(self.reject)
        layout = QtWidgets.QVBoxLayout()
        layout.addWidget(self.delay_label)
        layout.addWidget(self.delay_spinbox)
        layout.addWidget(self.first_char_delay_label)
        layout.addWidget(self.first_char_delay_spinbox)
        buttons_layout = QtWidgets.QHBoxLayout()
        buttons_layout.addWidget(self.save_button)
        buttons_layout.addWidget(self.cancel_button)
        layout.addLayout(buttons_layout)
        self.setLayout(layout)

    def save_settings(self):
        global delay, first_char_delay
        delay = self.delay_spinbox.value()
        first_char_delay = self.first_char_delay_spinbox.value()
        with open(SETTINGS_FILE, 'w') as f:
            f.write(f"{delay}\n{first_char_delay}")
        self.accept()

if __name__ == '__main__':

from pynput.keyboard import Key, Controller, Listener
from PyQt5 import QtWidgets, QtGui, QtCore

delay = 100
first_char_delay = 2000
SETTINGS_FILE = 'settings.txt'
shift_delay = 100

def is_key_upper_case(char):
    return char.is_upper() or char in string.punctuation

class Worker(QtCore.QThread):
    clipboard_changed = QtCore.pyqtSignal(str)

    def __init__(self, parent=None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.clipboard_content = pyperclip.paste()

    def run(self):
        while True:
            new_clipboard_content = pyperclip.paste()
            if new_clipboard_content != self.clipboard_content:
                self.clipboard_content = new_clipboard_content
                self.clipboard_changed.emit(new_clipboard_content)
            time.sleep(0.1)

class SystemTrayIcon(QtWidgets.QSystemTrayIcon):
    def __init__(self, icon, parent=None):
        QtWidgets.QSystemTrayIcon.__init__(self, icon, parent)
        self.menu = QtWidgets.QMenu()
        self.settings_action = self.menu.addAction('Settings')
        self.exit_action = self.menu.addAction('Exit')
        self.setContextMenu(self.menu)
        self.activated.connect(self.icon_activated)
        self.settings_action.triggered.connect(self.open_settings)
        self.exit_action.triggered.connect(self.close_settings)
        self.settings_dialog = None
        
        self.worker = Worker()
        self.worker.start()
        self.worker.clipboard_changed.connect(self.handle_clipboard_change)
        
        self.ctrl_pressed = False
        self.alt_pressed = False
        self.shift_pressed = False
        self.keyboard_listener = Listener(on_press=self.on_press, on_release=self.on_release)
        self.keyboard_listener.start()

    def icon_activated(self, reason):
        if reason == QtWidgets.QSystemTrayIcon.Context:
            self.menu.exec_(QtGui.QCursor.pos())

    def on_press(self, key):
        if key == Key.ctrl_l:
            self.ctrl_pressed = True
        elif key == Key.alt_l:
            self.alt_pressed = True
        elif key == Key.shift:
            self.shift_pressed = True

        if self.ctrl_pressed and self.alt_pressed and self.shift_pressed:
            self.type_copied_text()

    def on_release(self, key):
        if key == Key.ctrl_l:
            self.ctrl_pressed = False
        elif key == Key.alt_l:
            self.alt_pressed = False
        elif key == Key.shift:
            self.shift_pressed = False

    def handle_clipboard_change(self, text):
        self.worker.clipboard_content = text

    def open_settings(self):
        if not self.settings_dialog:
            self.settings_dialog = SettingsDialog()
        self.settings_dialog.show()

    def close_settings(self):
        QtWidgets.QApplication.quit()

    def type_copied_text(self):
        new_clipboard_content = pyperclip.paste().strip()
        if new_clipboard_content:
            time.sleep(first_char_delay / 1000)
            keyboard = Controller()
            for char in new_clipboard_content:
                if char in string.printable:
                    if is_key_upper_case(char):
                        keyboard.press(Key.shift)
                    keyboard.press(char)
                    keyboard.release(char)
                    if is_key_upper_case(char):
                        time.sleep(shift_delay / 1000)
                        keyboard.release(Key.shift)
                    time.sleep(delay / 1000)

class SettingsDialog(QtWidgets.QDialog):
    def __init__(self, parent=None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.setWindowTitle('Settings')
        self.setFixedSize(400, 300)
        self.delay_label = QtWidgets.QLabel('Delay between characters (ms):')
        self.delay_spinbox = QtWidgets.QSpinBox()
        self.delay_spinbox.setMinimum(0)
        self.delay_spinbox.setMaximum(10000)
        self.delay_spinbox.setValue(delay)
        self.first_char_delay_label = QtWidgets.QLabel('Delay before first character (ms):')
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox = QtWidgets.QSpinBox()
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox.setMinimum(0)
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox.setMaximum(10000)
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox.setValue(first_char_delay)
        self.save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton('Save')
        self.cancel_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton('Cancel')
        self.save_button.clicked.connect(self.save_settings)
        self.cancel_button.clicked.connect(self.reject)
        layout = QtWidgets.QVBoxLayout()
        layout.addWidget(self.delay_label)
        layout.addWidget(self.delay_spinbox)
        layout.addWidget(self.first_char_delay_label)
        layout.addWidget(self.first_char_delay_spinbox)
        buttons_layout = QtWidgets.QHBoxLayout()
        buttons_layout.addWidget(self.save_button)
        buttons_layout.addWidget(self.cancel_button)
        layout.addLayout(buttons_layout)
        self.setLayout(layout)

    def save_settings(self):
        global delay, first_char_delay
        delay = self.delay_spinbox.value()
        first_char_delay = self.first_char_delay_spinbox.value()
        with open(SETTINGS_FILE, 'w') as f:
            f.write(f"{delay}\n{first_char_delay}")
        self.accept()

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app = QtWidgets.QApplication([])
    app.setQuitOnLastWindowClosed(False)

    tray_icon = QtGui.QIcon("icon.png")

    if not QtWidgets.QSystemTrayIcon.isSystemTrayAvailable():
        QtWidgets.QMessageBox.critical(
            None,
            "System Tray Not Available",
            "Your system does not support system tray icons. This application will not be able to run.",
        )
        sys.exit(1)

    # Read saved settings
    if os.path.isfile(SETTINGS_FILE):
        with open(SETTINGS_FILE, "r") as f:
            lines = f.readlines()
            if len(lines) >= 2:
                delay = int(lines[0].strip())
                first_char_delay = int(lines[1].strip())

    tray = SystemTrayIcon(tray_icon)
    tray.show()
    QtWidgets.QApplication.setQuitOnLastWindowClosed(False)
    sys.exit(app.exec_())
```

This should work properly, but make sure to add an "icon.png" in the same folder as the script or adjust the "tray_icon" variable to the appropriate icon file you'd like to use.
After simultaneously pressing ctrl, alt and shift keys the app doesn't type any text from clipboard. Fix and give me full fixed code

To fix the issue with the app not typing any text from the clipboard when simultaneously pressing the CTRL, ALT, and SHIFT keys, we'll make a change in the `on_press` method of the `SystemTrayIcon` class. We'll add a flag called `paste_triggered` to check if paste was already triggered before starting to type, this will prevent text from being pasted multiple times. Here's the updated full code:

```python
import os
import sys
import pyperclip
import time
import string
from pynput.keyboard import Key, Controller, Listener
from PyQt5 import QtWidgets, QtGui, QtCore

delay = 100
first_char_delay = 2000
SETTINGS_FILE = 'settings.txt'
shift_delay = 100

def is_key_upper_case(char):
    return char.is_upper() or char in string.punctuation

class Worker(QtCore.QThread):
    clipboard_changed = QtCore.pyqtSignal(str)

    def __init__(self, parent=None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.clipboard_content = pyperclip.paste()

    def run(self):
        while True:
            new_clipboard_content = pyperclip.paste()
            if new_clipboard_content != self.clipboard_content:
                self.clipboard_content = new_clipboard_content
                self.clipboard_changed.emit(new_clipboard_content)
            time.sleep(0.1)

class SystemTrayIcon(QtWidgets.QSystemTrayIcon):
    def __init__(self, icon, parent=None):
        QtWidgets.QSystemTrayIcon.__init__(self, icon, parent)
        self.menu = QtWidgets.QMenu()
        self.settings_action = self.menu.addAction('Settings')
        self.exit_action = self.menu.addAction('Exit')
        self.setContextMenu(self.menu)
        self.activated.connect(self.icon_activated)
        self.settings_action.triggered.connect(self.open_settings)
        self.exit_action.triggered.connect(self.close_settings)
        self.settings_dialog = None

        self.worker = Worker()
        self.worker.start()
        self.worker.clipboard_changed.connect(self.handle_clipboard_change)
        self.paste_triggered = False

        self.ctrl_pressed = False
        self.alt_pressed = False
        self.shift_pressed = False
        self.keyboard_listener = Listener(on_press=self.on_press, on_release=self.on_release)
        self.keyboard_listener.start()

    def icon_activated(self, reason):
        if reason == QtWidgets.QSystemTrayIcon.Context:
            self.menu.exec_(QtGui.QCursor.pos())

    def on_press(self, key):
        if key == Key.ctrl_l:
            self.ctrl_pressed = True
        elif key == Key.alt_l:
            self.alt_pressed = True
        elif key == Key.shift:
            self.shift_pressed = True

        if self.ctrl_pressed and self.alt_pressed and self.shift_pressed:
            if not self.paste_triggered:
                self.paste_triggered = True
                self.type_copied_text()

    def on_release(self, key):
        if key == Key.ctrl_l:
            self.ctrl_pressed = False
        elif key == Key.alt_l:
            self.alt_pressed = False
        elif key == Key.shift:
            self.shift_pressed = False
        self.paste_triggered = False

    def handle_clipboard_change(self, text):
        self.worker.clipboard_content = text

    def open_settings(self):
        if not self.settings_dialog:
            self.settings_dialog = SettingsDialog()
        self.settings_dialog.show()

    def close_settings(self):
        QtWidgets.QApplication.quit()

    def type_copied_text(self):
        new_clipboard_content = pyperclip.paste().strip()
        if new_clipboard_content:
            time.sleep(first_char_delay / 1000)
            keyboard = Controller()
            for char in new_clipboard_content:
                if char in string.printable:
                    if is_key_upper_case(char):
                        keyboard.press(Key.shift)
                    keyboard.press(char)
                    keyboard.release(char)
                    if is_key_upper_case(char):
                        time.sleep(shift_delay / 1000)
                        keyboard.release(Key.shift)
                    time.sleep(delay / 1000)

class SettingsDialog(QtWidgets.QDialog):
    def __init__(self, parent=None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.setWindowTitle('Settings')
        self.setFixedSize(400, 300)
        self.delay_label = QtWidgets.QLabel('Delay between characters (ms):')
        self.delay_spinbox = QtWidgets.QSpinBox()
        self.delay_spinbox.setMinimum(0)
        self.delay_spinbox.setMaximum(10000)
        self.delay_spinbox.setValue(delay)
        self.first_char_delay_label = QtWidgets.QLabel('Delay before first character (ms):')
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox = QtWidgets.QSpinBox()
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox.setMinimum(0)
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox.setMaximum(10000)
        self.first_char_delay_spinbox.setValue(first_char_delay)
        self.save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton('Save')

        self.cancel_button.clicked.connect(self.reject)
        layout = QtWidgets.QVBoxLayout()
        layout.addWidget(self.delay_label)
